dark.name: Midnight Ocean
dark.story: Dive into the depths of creativity where the ocean meets the night sky. Deep blues and turquoise waves inspire your musical journey through calm, mysterious waters.

warm.name: Sunset Boulevard
warm.story: Feel the warmth of golden hour as creativity flows like molten amber. Rich oranges and warm reds ignite passion in every note, like a perfect sunset over the city.

cool.name: Arctic Aurora
cool.story: Experience the serene beauty of northern lights dancing across frozen landscapes. Cool blues and icy tones bring clarity and focus to your creative process.

neon.name: Tokyo Nights
neon.story: Step into the electric pulse of neon-lit streets where music never sleeps. Vibrant purples and magentas fuel your late-night creative sessions with pure energy.

classic.name: Timeless Elegance
classic.story: Embrace the sophistication of black and white, where every detail matters. Clean, minimal, and eternally stylish—like a perfectly mastered track.

sakura.name: Sakura Dreams
sakura.story: Float through cherry blossom gardens where soft pinks meet gentle whites. Delicate and peaceful, like petals dancing in spring breeze—perfect for your most serene creations.

onboarding.title: Choose Your Creative Atmosphere
onboarding.subtitle: Select a theme that resonates with your creative spirit. You can change it anytime.
